ModMetaData.author: YourName
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a carpentry system to RimWorld! Process raw wood into refined wooden planks and build beautiful plank walls.
Features: - Carpentry Bench: Process wood into wooden planks (2 wood â†’ 1 plank) - Wooden Planks: A refined building material - Plank Walls: Attractive walls made from 3 wooden planks - Unlocked with Smithing research
Perfect for colonies that want to make better use of their abundant wood resources while creating more refined structures.
